feature_model.name: eShop
feature_model.feature_tree: :r eShop (f_eShop) :m security (f_security) :m catalogue (f_catalogue) :m payment (f_payment) :o search (f_search) :g [1, *] : bank trasnsfer (f_bank_trasnsfer) : e-coins (f_e_coins) : credit card (f_credit_card) :g [1, 1] : high (f_high) : standard (f_standard)
